synopsis.text: How do Sasaki and Miyano navigate the complexities of young love while on the brink of a new chapter in their lives? As high school graduation looms, Sasaki, a senior, struggles to balance his future aspirations with his deepening relationship with his junior boyfriend, Micky Miyano. The couple, having recently made their relationship official, yearns for shared moments and intimacy. Yet, they must confront challenges such as university entrance exams, Valentine's Day, and the daunting task of revealing their relationship to friends and family. Amidst stolen kisses and shared passions for Boys' Love manga, the two must learn to navigate their desires and emotions. Join Sasaki and Miyano in this heartwarming journey, as they embark on the trials and tribulations of young love, and face the future together. Included in the Crunchyroll stream, witness a glimpse into the daily lives of their friends, Hirano and Kagiura.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
